nodes.text: House Kast was a Mandalorian house whose signet depicted a coiled vexis. Clan Rook was part of this house.

Member of House Kast appeared in Star Wars Rebels: Heroes of Mandalore, the premiere of the fourth season of Star Wars Rebels, which aired in 2017.[source?] House Kast was later identified in the 2020 reference book The Star Wars Book. Two Mandalorians, Rook Kast and Veraslayn Kast, share their names with the House, although no connection has been made.
